Female: Menses scanty, with dull, painful, nightly increasing pressure in the right lumbar region

details: A remedy for hysteria. Globus and clavus hystericus. Women at climaxis, with vomiting of green substance, especially in the morning. SLEEPLESSNESS. Nervous trembling of body; sensitive to light and noise. Dysmenorrhoea of young girls.
name: Aquilegia
